2092010.name: Attack of the Trafalas®
2092010.description:
A long time ago in a small island, an organization of evil robots have taken over, with the mission of corrupting and exterminating mankind, until a few decided to resist.

Attack of the Trafalas is a Detective Hacker Fighting sim set in the digital multiverse where anything may happen. Fight your way to the top of the evil robot organization that you have created and turned against you, now you have to shut it down by becoming the best version of yourself, physically, mentally and electronically to combat the biggest evil organization the multiverse has ever seen which goal is to exterminate mankind in every reality.

The Official Prequel to Attacking Zegeta© Series
2092010.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
